holidays.title: Chimborazo Day
holidays.description: A day for celebrating the highest point on Earth? That’s Chimborazo Day for you!

holidays.title: European Bicycle Day
holidays.description: Non-motorized transport is more important than we think to achieve sustainable development.

holidays.title: H.M. Queens Birthday
holidays.description: Join the celebration as we honor Queen Suthida on H.M. Queen's Birthday.

holidays.title: Insect Repellent Awareness Day
holidays.description: Rid your environment of pests and diseases by observing Insect Repellent Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Love Conquers All Day
holidays.description: We love love and on Love Conquers All Day we can’t get enough of it. Love gives us the strength and hope to conquer all challenges of life.

holidays.title: Mabo Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this historic event that revolutionized land rights for Indigenous Australian communities.

holidays.title: Martyrs Day Uganda
holidays.description: Honor the martyrs and the bold sacrifice they made in holding fast to their beliefs.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Macaroon Day
holidays.description: All the dessert lovers in America celebrate National Chocolate Macaroon Day on June 3.

holidays.title: National Simp Day
holidays.description: Let's spread the word that the term "simp" isn't as harmless as many people believe.

holidays.title: Opium Suppression Movement Day
holidays.description: It’s never too late to quit smoking. Throw out your cigarettes and start afresh.

holidays.title: Repeat Day
holidays.description: Repeating can be a wonderful thing. Especially when it involves an activity we love.

holidays.title: World Bicycle Day
holidays.description: Riding a bicycle without training wheels was the first challenging physical activity we mastered.

holidays.title: World Cider Day
holidays.description: Gather your friends, pour a few pints, and enjoy the familiar crispness of a delicious cider!

holidays.title: Jefferson Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This American politician has gone down in history with reverence and his legacy is preserved.

holidays.title: Josephine Baker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Josephine Baker’s work and success helped black entertainers to become recognized as artists worldwide.

holidays.title: Louis Partridge’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actor has the whole world in view and is ready to conquer.

holidays.title: Rafael Nadal’s Birthday
holidays.description: This record-breaking tennis player has achieved real greatness and he keeps moving forward.

holidays.title: Yaya Panton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This dynamic teenage YouTube child star is loved by millions for her interesting videos.

holidays.title: Zayne Emory’s Birthday
holidays.description: Zayne Emory is a talented actor who has appeared in popular T.V. shows like “Supergirl.”
